article_title: Ohio Governor John Kasich's Medicaid Expansion

article_metadata.description: Presidential candidate John Kasich (R-Ohio) has taken a lot of criticism on the campaign trail for expanding Medicaid under Obamacare. But if his Medicaid expansion isn’t an extraordinary example of successful conservative governance I don’t know what would be. Republican presidential candidate John Kasich (R-OH) (Photo by Darren McCollester/Getty Images) The Affordable [...]
article_metadata.author: Robert Laszewski
